page.title: 05RAGDALE HALL HEALTH HYDRO _1
page.content:
Ragdale Hall, on the outskirts of Ragdale Village, is now a Health Hydro. The Hall is set in 13 acres of beautiful Leicestershire countryside. It is a red brick building, built in the late 18th Century as a hunting lodge for the Shirley Family.
The Hall is a health and relaxation centre. It can accommodate a maximum of 75 guests, in single and twin_bedded rooms, each with private Bath/shower and lavatory. Prices range from Â£45.00 per day for a single room to Â£75.00 for a suite. Guests can stay for a length of time, from one day to several weeks. The Hall is furnished and decorated most taste_ fully. There are comfortable lounges, a bar which sells low_calorie soft drinks and coffee and a little bou_ tiqe which sells clothes and make_up.
